sentences.english: Djakarta was a collection of sweltering huts and hovels.
sentences.chinese: 雅加达实际不过是一大堆闷热的棚户和茅舍。

sentences.english: The government undertook that all shantytowns would be redeveloped before the year 2018.
sentences.chinese: 政府保证在2018年前对所有的棚户区进行改造。

sentences.english: However, the core zone in the city shantytowns gradually disappears.
sentences.chinese: 然而，就在城市核心地带的棚户区逐渐消失的时候。

sentences.english: The family's shanty burns to the ground in mid-winter.
sentences.chinese: 家庭的棚户烧伤年年中冬季地面。

sentences.english: The cost of erecting a shack is recouped within a year or two.
sentences.chinese: 设立棚户的补偿可在一到两年内获得。

sentences.english: Baloyi works at his home in a shanty town outside Johannesburg.
sentences.chinese: Baloyi作品在他位于约翰内斯堡棚户区外的家。

sentences.english: But in time, such shantytowns will simply become part of the landscape.
sentences.chinese: 但是到那时，这样的棚户区将成为景观的一部分。
